DOC.brief_summary: To assess clinical radiographic outcome 5-years follow treatment CHARITÉ™ Artificial Disc vs. BAK Cage treatment degenerative disc disease one level ( L4-S1 ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This study extension 5 year follow-up randomize comparative IDE trial CHARITÉ™ Artificial Disc vs. ALIF BAK cage treatment degenerative disc disease . The original 2-year trial demonstrate non-inferiority CHARITÉ™ compare ALIF . This extension continue follow-up original outcome measure also examine adjacent segment progression .
DOC.criteria: Participated either train randomized arm CHARITÉ Artificial Disc IDE study , Still original implant receive index surgery .
